title: Portfolio
text:
LY Pechvattana
  Showcasing my work in robotics engineering, autonomous systems, and embedded electronics. Each project demonstrates hands-on experience in designing, building, and deploying real-world robotic and space vehicle solutions.


üöÄ Featured Projects




  
    
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      ‚ùÆ
      ‚ùØ
      
        
        
        
      
    
  
  
    Rocket Flight Computer
    
      Developed Cambodia's first university rocket launch project with a comprehensive flight computer system for real-time attitude determination and state estimation using Extended Kalman Filter algorithms.
    
    
    
      
        Implemented EKF for rocket attitude determination and unknown input thrust estimation
        Designed and programmed rocket ignition electronic system with safety protocols
        Data acquisition using Pixhawk
        Successfully launched Cambodia's first university rocket (2024)
      
    
    
    
      Technologies: C++ ‚Ä¢ Python ‚Ä¢ MATLAB ‚Ä¢ Simulink ‚Ä¢ Extended Kalman Filter ‚Ä¢ PCB Design ‚Ä¢ KiCAD ‚Ä¢ Pixhawk
    
    
    
      
        üìÇ Project Detail
      
      
        üé• Watch Video
      
      
        üìÑ Read Paper
      
    
  



  
    
      
        
      
      
        
      
      ‚ùÆ
      ‚ùØ
      
        
        
        
      
    
  
  
    Autonomous Mobile Robot (AMR) for Part Delivery
    
      Designing and developing an autonomous mobile robot system for automated part delivery in manufacturing facility using ROS2 navigation stack and advanced SLAM algorithms.
    
    
    
      
        Mechanic and electronic design/part selection.
        Implementing ROS2 and Nav2 for robust autonomous navigation
        SLAM integration for real-time environment mapping and localization
        Path planning and dynamic obstacle avoidance algorithms
      
    
    
    
      Technologies: ROS2 ‚Ä¢ Nav2 ‚Ä¢ SLAM ‚Ä¢ Python ‚Ä¢ C++ ‚Ä¢ LiDAR ‚Ä¢ Computer Vision ‚Ä¢ Path Planning
    
    
  



  
    
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      ‚ùÆ
      ‚ùØ
      
        
        
        
      
    
  
  
    Automatic Guided Vehicle (AGV) Navigation System
    
      Developed a semi-autonomous navigation system for an AGV during my internship at Kasetsart University, implementing ROS-based SLAM and LiDAR sensor fusion in simulation and actrual robot.
    
    
    
      
        Implemented ROS-based navigation stack for AGV control
        LiDAR sensor integration for environment perception and mapping
        SLAM algorithms for real-time localization in dynamic warehouses
        Semi-autonomous path following and waypoint navigation
        Obstacle detection and collision avoidance system
      
    
    
    
      Technologies: ROS ‚Ä¢ SLAM ‚Ä¢ LiDAR ‚Ä¢ Python ‚Ä¢ C++ ‚Ä¢ Raspberry Pi ‚Ä¢ Sensor Fusion
    
  



  
    
      
        
      
      
        
      
      ‚ùÆ
      ‚ùØ
      
        
        
        
      
    
  
  
    Rocket Ground Station Electronics
    
      Designed and built a comprehensive ground station system for rocket telemetry data reception, real-time monitoring, command transmission, and emergency abort capabilities.
    
    
    
      
        Wireless telemetry system for real-time data transmission
        Real-time data visualization dashboard for flight monitoring
        Command and control protocol for rocket operations
        Emergency abort and safety system integration
        Data logging and post-flight analysis tools
      
    
    
    
      Technologies: Python ‚Ä¢ Embedded C ‚Ä¢ RF Communication ‚Ä¢ PCB Design ‚Ä¢ KiCAD ‚Ä¢ Data Visualization

üíº Professional Experience


  
    
    Total Industrial Engineering Officer
    DENSO (Cambodia) Co., Ltd., Phnom Penh
    June 2025 - Present
    
      Designing and developing autonomous mobile robot (AMR) for automated part delivery
      Implementing ROS2 and Nav2 stack for robust navigation in manufacturing environments
      Leading SLAM integration for dynamic factory floor mapping
      Optimizing production workflows through robotic automation
    
  

  
    
    Research Assistant
    Dynamics and Control Laboratory (DCLab), ITC
    August 2024 - June 2025
    
      Advanced research on rocket attitude determination using Extended Kalman Filter
      Published research paper on unknown input thrust estimation
      Mentored undergraduate students on robotics and control systems projects
    
  

  
    
    Robotic Engineer Intern
    Kasetsart University, Bangkok, Thailand
    June 2023 - September 2023
    
      Developed semi-autonomous navigation for AGV using ROS and SLAM
      Integrated LiDAR sensors for real-time environment mapping
      Implemented obstacle detection and path planning algorithms
      Collaborated with international research team on warehouse automation
    
  

  
    
    Undergraduate Research Student
    Dynamics and Control Laboratory (DCLab), ITC
    October 2020 - July 2024
    
      Contributed to Cambodia's first university rocket launch project
      Developed rocket flight computer with EKF-based state estimation
      Designed ignition electronics and ground station communication systems
      Presented research at international conferences
    
  


üìö Publications


  Unknown Input Thrust Estimation using Extended Kalman Filter for a Sounding Rocket
  
    The 6th KU SRC International Conference 2024 E-Proceeding (Full Paper)
  
  
    This paper presents a novel approach to estimating unknown input thrust for sounding rockets using Extended Kalman Filter algorithms, enabling improved flight control and trajectory prediction.

title: Using Pixhawk 4 with Simulink
section: 2. Use Cygwin Toolchain to Build PX4 on Windows
text:
2. Use Cygwin Toolchain to Build PX4 on Windows

Install Cygwin from here
Download PX4 Source Code from GitHub

Go to the installed directory of Cgywin


mkdir mypx4
cd mypx4
git clone https://github.com/PX4/Firmware.git Firmware
cd Firmware
git checkout v1.12.3
git submodule update --init --recursive
`

title: LY Pechvattana
text: LY Pechvattana graduated in Robotics and Automation Engineering. His main research interest in spacecraft guidance, navigation, and control system.
